text: The women's 100 metres event at the 1994 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Lisbon, Portugal, at Estádio Universitário de Lisboa on 20 and 21 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Sabrina Kelly ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Aspen Burkett ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Philomena Mensah ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 21 July Wind: +2.0 m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
